import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Markdown from "@theme/Markdown";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Update a Grafana folder by UID</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"/v1/grafana/api/folders/{id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Updates a folder by UID.
Make sure the region in the URL matches your account's region.


## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"in":"path","name":"uid","required":true,"description":"The UID of the folder","schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3><strong className={"openapi-schema__required"}>required</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"uid"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The UID of the folder","example":"my-folder-uid"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"title"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The title of the folder","example":"Updated Folder Title"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"version"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"The version number of the folder","example":2}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"overwrite"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to overwrite if folder exists","example":false}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Folder updated

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"The numeric ID of the folder","example":123}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"uid"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The UID of the folder","example":"my-folder-uid"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"title"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The title of the folder","example":"Updated Folder Title"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"url"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The URL path to the folder","example":"/dashboards/f/my-folder-uid/updated-folder-title"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"created"} required={false} schemaName={"date-time"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"ISO timestamp when the folder was created","example":"2024-01-15T10:30:00Z"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"updated"} required={false} schemaName={"date-time"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"ISO timestamp when the folder was last updated","example":"2024-01-16T14:45:30Z"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"version"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"The version number of the folder","example":2}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"id\": 123,\n  \"uid\": \"my-folder-uid\",\n  \"title\": \"Updated Folder Title\",\n  \"url\": \"/dashboards/f/my-folder-uid/updated-folder-title\",\n  \"created\": \"2024-01-15T10:30:00Z\",\n  \"updated\": \"2024-01-16T14:45:30Z\",\n  \"version\": 2\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
